title: Rav Bender Slams Toameha Gatherings
body: Rav Yaakov Bender, rosh yeshiva of Yeshiva Darchei Torah, warns against growing alcohol consumption in frum communities, singling out Friday toameha gatherings as a destructive trend. He calls for a ban.

title: Agudah National Action Summit
body: Agudah's National Action Summit brings together professionals and leaders for two days of dialogue, collaboration, and action on Klal Yisroel's pressing challenges.
